name: ExtractJob
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob
description:
ExtractJob

A Job subclass representing an export operation that may be performed on a Table. A ExtractJob instance is created when you call Table#extract.

methods.name: destinations
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#destinations
methods.description: The URI or URIs representing the Google Cloud Storage files to which the data is exported.

methods.name: source
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#source
methods.description: The table from which the data is exported. This is the table upon which Table#extract was called. Returns a Table instance.

methods.name: compression?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#compression?
methods.description: Checks if the export operation compresses the data using gzip. The default is false.

methods.name: json?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#json?
methods.description: Checks if the destination format for the data is newline-delimited JSON. The default is false.

methods.name: csv?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#csv?
methods.description: Checks if the destination format for the data is CSV. Tables with nested or repeated fields cannot be exported as CSV. The default is true.

methods.name: avro?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#avro?
methods.description: Checks if the destination format for the data is Avro. The default is false.

methods.name: delimiter
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#delimiter
methods.description: The symbol the operation uses to delimit fields in the exported data. The default is a comma (,).

methods.name: print_header?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#print_header?
methods.description: Checks if the exported data contains a header row. The default is true.

methods.name: destinations_file_counts
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#destinations_file_counts
methods.description: The count of files per destination URI or URI pattern specified in #destinations. Returns an Array of values in the same order as the URI patterns.

methods.name: destinations_counts
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
ExtractJob#destinations_counts
methods.description: The count of files per destination URI or URI pattern specified in #destinations. Returns a Hash with the URI patterns as keys and the counts as values.
